 2020-10842020-12-17,  ,  ,  ISED, 
ActNational Research Council Act
PrecisAppointment of MITCH DAVIES of Ottawa, Ontario, to be interim President of the National Research Council of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term commencing on December 28, 2020 and ending on September 27, 2022.
